issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Scenario:
We want enable NN dfs.namenode.servicerpc-address to separate the client and DN RPC,and do it begin with standby NN--just add the property to standby NN and DNs,when EditLogTailer choose active NN address,it only reset the active NN's nnId generic keys ,but don't unset if not special,so the standby NN choose itself as active NN.
fields.summary: HAUtil#getConfForOtherNodes should unset independent generic keys before initialize

comments.body:
Good find [~Deng FEI].
But IMO, best place to unset those props is in {{HAUtil.getConfForOtherNodes()}}, as this will not affect the Non-HA mode.

Also, I would recommend to unset only those props which must have different conf in HA environment.
Not all keys mentioned in NAMENODE_SPECIFIC_KEYS must be different. Some can be same too. Those need not be unset. If unset, it might not be reset during initializeGenericKeys.

Also your patch seems not based on trunk.
Trunk have support to multiple namenodes. so {{HAUtil.getConfForOtherNodes()}} returns list of confs.

[~vinayrpet]] 
Thanks for your good suggestion,i considered it simple,although it's working well on our cluster(the unset only appear at standby EditLogTailer/ImageServlet on HA mode).
I will upload new patch on newest trunk.

Patch looks good.
some code-formatting might be required. Anyway QA should report it.
